trans-unit.source: Displays a hierarchical collection of labeled items, each represented by a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Apresenta uma colecção hierárquica de itens identificados, cada representados por um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A> collection holds all the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects that are assigned to the TreeView control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A>coleção contém todos os o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>objetos que estão atribuídos ao controlo TreeView.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The tree nodes in this collection are referred to as the root tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: Os nós da árvore nesta coleção são referidos como nós de árvores de raiz.

trans-unit.source: Any tree node that is subsequently added to a root tree node is referred to as a child node.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer nó de árvore, subsequentemente, é adicionado a um nó de árvore de raiz é referido como um nó subordinado.

trans-unit.source: Because each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> can contain a collection of other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects, you might find it difficult to determine your location in the tree structure when you iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: Porque cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>pode conter uma coleção de outras <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>objetos, poderá achar difícil determinar a localização na estrutura de árvore quando iterar através da coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: You can parse the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName> string by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A> string value to determine where a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> label begins and ends.
trans-unit.target: Pode analisar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName>cadeia utilizando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A>cadeia de valor para determinar onde um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>etiqueta inicia e termina.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can display images next to the tree nodes by assigning an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A> property and referencing the index value of an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> to assign that <xref:System.Drawing.Image>.
trans-unit.target: Pode visualizar imagens junto a nós da árvore atribuindo um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A>propriedade e referenciar o valor de índice de um <xref:System.Drawing.Image> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>atribuir esse <xref:System.Drawing.Image>.</xref:System.Drawing.Image> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Drawing.Image> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: Use the following properties to assign images: - Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> property to the index value of the <xref:System.Drawing.Image> that you want to display when a tree node is not selected.
trans-unit.target: Utilize as seguintes propriedades para atribuir imagens: – Configure a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>propriedade para o valor de índice de <xref:System.Drawing.Image>que pretende apresentar quando um nó de árvore não estiver seleccionado.</xref:System.Drawing.Image> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> property to the index value of the <xref:System.Drawing.Image> that you want to display when a tree node is selected.
trans-unit.target: -Definir a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>propriedade para o valor de índice de <xref:System.Drawing.Image>que pretende apresentar quando está selecionado um nó de árvore.</xref:System.Drawing.Image> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The images referenced by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> property values are the default images displayed by all the tree nodes that are assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: As imagens referenciadas pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>valores de propriedade são as imagens predefinido apresentadas por todos os nós da árvore que estão atribuídos ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Individual tree nodes can override the default images by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.SelectedImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: Nós da árvore individuais podem substituir as imagens predefinidas definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.SelectedImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.SelectedImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The state images displayed in the TreeView are 16 x 16 pixels by default.
trans-unit.target: As imagens de estado apresentadas em TreeView são 16x16 pixels por predefinição.

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> will have no effect on how the images are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>não tem qualquer efeito na forma como são apresentadas as imagens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, the state images are resized according to the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ``` Tree nodes can be expanded to display the next level of child tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, as imagens de estado são redimensionadas, de acordo com a definição do sistema DPI quando o ficheiro App. config contém a seguinte entrada: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ``` nós da árvore que podem ser expandidos para apresentar o próximo nível de nós da árvore de subordinados.

trans-unit.source: The user can expand the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> by clicking the plus-sign (+) button, if one is displayed next to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>, or you can expand the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: O utilizador pode expandir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>ao clicar no botão de-sinal de adição (+), se um é apresentado junto ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>, ou pode expandir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>ao chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: To expand all the child tree node levels in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> collection, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para expandir a todos os níveis de nó da árvore o subordinado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A>coleção, chamada o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can collapse the child <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> level by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Collapse%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, or the user can press the minus-sign (-) button, if one is displayed next to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: Pode fechar o subordinado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>nível ao chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Collapse%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método, ou o utilizador pode premir o botão de sinal de subtração (-), se um é apresentado junto ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Collapse%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: You can also call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Toggle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to alternate between the expanded and collapsed states.
trans-unit.target: Também pode chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Toggle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método alternativo entre os Estados expandidos e fechados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Toggle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Tree nodes can optionally display check boxes.
trans-unit.target: Nós de árvore, opcionalmente, podem apresentar as caixas de verificação.

trans-unit.source: To display the check boxes, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A> property of the TreeView to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para apresentar as caixas de verificação, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>propriedade de TreeView para `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A> property is set to `true` for tree nodes that are in a checked state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>propriedade está definida como `true` para nós da árvore que estão num estado marcado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property from within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck> event causes the event to be raised multiple times and can result in unexpected behavior.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Definição o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade a partir do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck>evento faz com que seja gerado várias vezes o evento e pode resultar num comportamento inesperado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A> property in the event handler when you are recursively updating the child nodes so that the user does not have to expand and check each one individually.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>propriedade o processador de eventos quando estiver em modo recursivo atualizar os nós subordinados para que o utilizador não tem de expandir e verifique cada um deles individualmente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: To prevent the event from being raised multiple times, add logic to your event handler that only executes your recursive code if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para impedir que o evento a ser gerados várias vezes, adicione lógica para o processador de eventos que executa apenas o código de recursiva se a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs>não está definido como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A>

trans-unit.source: For an example of how to do this, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck> events.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de como fazê-lo, consulte a secção de exemplo do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck>

trans-unit.source: You can change the appearance of the TreeView control by setting some of its display and style properties.
trans-unit.target: Pode alterar o aspecto do controlo TreeView definindo algumas das propriedades mostra e estilo.

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowPlusMinus%2A> to `true` displays a plus-sign or minus-sign button next to each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> that can be expanded or collapsed, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Definição <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowPlusMinus%2A>para `true` apresenta um sinal de adição- ou o sinal de subtração junto a cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>que pode ser expandido ou fechada, respetivamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowPlusMinus%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowRootLines%2A> property to `true` causes the TreeView to display lines that join all the root tree nodes together.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowRootLines%2A>propriedade `true` faz com que a TreeView apresentar linhas que associe todos os nós da árvore de raiz em conjunto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowRootLines%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can display lines that connect child tree nodes to their root node by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowLines%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Pode visualizar as linhas que ligam nós da árvore de subordinados para o nó de raiz, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowLines%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowLines%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.HotTracking%2A> property to `true` changes the appearance of the tree node labels as the mouse pointer passes over them.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.HotTracking%2A>propriedade `true` alterações o aspeto das etiquetas de nó de árvore, como o ponteiro do rato passa por cima deles.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.HotTracking%2A>

trans-unit.source: When hot-tracked, the tree node labels take on the appearance of a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: Quando frequente-controlados, as etiquetas de nó de árvore colocar o aspeto de um hyperlink.

trans-unit.source: You can also completely customize the appearance of the TreeView control.
trans-unit.target: Completamente também pode personalizar o aspecto do controlo TreeView.

trans-unit.source: To do this, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A> property to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode> event.
trans-unit.target: Para tal, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A>propriedade para um valor diferente de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>e processam a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Scrollable%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> properties at run time, the TreeView handle is recreated (see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) to update the control's appearance.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ao definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Scrollable%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>Propriedades no tempo de execução, o identificador de TreeView é recriado (consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) para atualizar o aspecto do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Scrollable%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>

trans-unit.source: This causes all tree nodes to be collapsed, except for the selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: Isto faz com que todos os nós da árvore de ser fechado, exceto o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> selecionado

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the tree node check box is checked.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre depois da caixa de verificação do nó da árvore está marcada.

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property from within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck> or AfterCheck event handler causes the event to be raised multiple times and can result in unexpected behavior.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade a partir de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck>ou processador de eventos de AfterCheck faz com que seja gerado várias vezes o evento e pode resultar num comportamento inesperado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To prevent the event from being raised multiple times, add logic to your event handler that only executes your recursive code if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para impedir que o evento a ser gerados várias vezes, adicione lógica para o processador de eventos que executa apenas o código de recursiva se a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs>não está definido como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the tree node check box is checked.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre antes da caixa de verificação do nó da árvore está marcada.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property from within the BeforeCheck or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck> event causes the event to be raised multiple times and can result in unexpected behavior.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE]> Definição o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade de dentro de BeforeCheck ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck>evento faz com que seja gerado várias vezes o evento e pode resultar num comportamento inesperado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A> property in the event handler when you are recursively updating the child nodes, so that the user does not have to expand and check each one individually.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>propriedade o processador de eventos quando estiver em modo recursivo atualizar os nós subordinados, para que o utilizador não tem de expandir e verifique cada um deles individualmente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: To prevent the event from being raised multiple times, add logic to your event handler that only executes your recursive code if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para impedir que o evento a ser gerados várias vezes, adicione lógica para o processador de eventos que executa apenas o código de recursiva se a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs>não está definido como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A>

trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Disables any redrawing of the tree view.
trans-unit.target: Desativa a qualquer um novo desenho da vista de árvore.

trans-unit.source: To maintain performance while items are added one at a time to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>, call the BeginUpdate method.
trans-unit.target: Para manter o desempenho enquanto estão a ser adicionados um de cada vez para itens de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>, chame o método BeginUpdate.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The BeginUpdate method prevents the control from painting until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: O método BeginUpdate impede o controlo de desenho até o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A>método é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The preferred way to add items to a tree view control is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection.AddRange%2A> method to add an array of tree node items to a tree view.
trans-unit.target: A forma preferencial para adicionar itens a um controlo de vista de árvore consiste em utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection.AddRange%2A>método para adicionar uma matriz de itens de nó de árvore a uma vista de árvore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to add items one at a time, use the BeginUpdate method to prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control from painting during the add operations.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se pretender adicionar os itens um cada vez, utilize o método de BeginUpdate para impedir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controlo de desenho durante as operações de adicionar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: To allow the control to resume painting, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A> method when all the tree nodes have been added to the tree view.
trans-unit.target: Para permitir o controlo retomar o desenho, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A>método quando todos os nós da árvore foram adicionados para a vista de árvore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo do limite do controlo de vista de árvore.

trans-unit.source: When the BorderStyle property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> has a sunken, three-dimensional appearance.
trans-unit.target: Quando a propriedade BorderStyle é definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>tem um aspeto sunken, three-dimensional.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: To display a flat, thin border around the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Para apresentar um simples, dinâmico limite em redor do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controlo, defina a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: O valor atribuído não é um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether check boxes are displayed next to the tree nodes in the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se as caixas de verificação são apresentadas junto a nós da árvore no controlo de vista de árvore.

trans-unit.source: A check box is displayed to the left of both the tree node label and tree node <xref:System.Drawing.Image>, if any.
trans-unit.target: É apresentada uma caixa de verificação para a esquerda da etiqueta do nó de árvore e no nó da árvore <xref:System.Drawing.Image>, se aplicável.</xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: Check boxes allow the user to select more than one tree node at a time.
trans-unit.target: Caixas de verificação Permitir ao utilizador selecionar mais do que um nó de árvore a uma hora.

trans-unit.source: When the CheckBoxes property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> is set to `true`, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> property is set, each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> that is contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> displays the first and second images from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> to indicate an unchecked or checked state, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Quando a propriedade de caixas de verificação de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>está definido como `true`e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>for definida, cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>que está contida no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>apresenta as imagens primeira e segunda do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>para indicar um Estado marcado ou desmarcado, respetivamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: However, the displayed images may be different if the following situation occurs: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> of the node is set to a value other than 0 or 1, and the CheckBoxes property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> will not automatically reset to -1 to indicate it is not set.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, as imagens apresentadas podem ser diferentes se ocorrer a situação seguinte: se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>do nó está definido como um valor diferente de 0 ou 1 e a propriedade de caixas de verificação do principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>está definido como `false`, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>não irá repor automaticamente como -1 para indicar que não está definido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the state image at the indicated index position is shown.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, é apresentada a imagem de estado da posição de índice indicado.

trans-unit.source: If CheckBoxes is set to `true` again, the first and second images of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> are shown to indicate a checked or unchecked state, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Se as caixas de verificação estiver definida como `true` novamente, as primeira e segunda as imagens do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>são apresentadas para indicar um Estado marcado ou desmarcado, respetivamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When setting the CheckBoxes property at run time, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> handle is recreated (see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) to update the control's appearance.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ao definir a propriedade de caixas de verificação em tempo de execução, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>identificador é recriado (consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) para atualizar o aspecto do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This causes all tree nodes to be collapsed, with the exception of the selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: Isto faz com que todos os nós da árvore de ser fechado com a exceção <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> selecionado

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a check box is displayed next to each tree node in the tree view control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se é apresentada uma caixa de verificação junto a cada nó de árvore no controlo de vista de árvore; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Collapses all the tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: Fecha todos os nós de árvore.

trans-unit.source: The CollapseAll method collapses all the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects, which includes all the child tree nodes, that are in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: O método CollapseAll fecha todos os <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>objetos, que inclui todos os subordinados nós de árvores, que se encontrem no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The state of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> persists.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O estado de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>persistir.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose that you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A> method for a root tree node.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, suponha que tem de chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A>método para um nó raiz da árvore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the child tree nodes were not previously collapsed, they will appear in their previously-expanded state.
trans-unit.target: Se os nós da árvore de subordinados não foram anteriormente fechados, serão apresentados no respetivo estado previamente expandidos.

trans-unit.source: Calling the CollapseAll method ensures that all the tree nodes appear in the collapsed state.
trans-unit.target: O CollapseAll ao chamar o método garante que todos os nós da árvore aparecem no estado fechado.

trans-unit.target: Cria um identificador para o controlo.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos não geridos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> e opcionalmente liberta os recursos geridos.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado pelo público `Dispose` método e o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`invoca protegida `Dispose(Boolean)` método com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro for true, este método versões retidos por quaisquer objetos geridos de todos os recursos que este <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>referências.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o `Dispose` método de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control should redraw its surface using a secondary buffer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o controlo deve redesenhar a superfície de utilizar uma memória intermédia secundária.

trans-unit.source: The DoubleBuffered property does not affect the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DoubleBuffered não afeta o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Setting the DoubleBuffered property does not affect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: Definir o DoubleBuffered propriedade não afeta o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: If you want to reduce flicker when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> is drawn, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Se quiser reduzir flicker quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>é desenhado, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control uses a secondary buffer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controlo utiliza uma memória intermédia secundária; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the mode in which the control is drawn.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o modo em que o controlo é desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The nodes of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> are typically drawn by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Os nós de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>normalmente são desenhados pelo sistema operativo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The DrawMode property lets you customize the appearance of the nodes.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DrawMode permite-lhe personalizar o aspeto de nós.

trans-unit.source: To do this, set DrawMode to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> and provide a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode> event.
trans-unit.target: Para tal, defina DrawMode como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>e fornecer um processador para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This is called owner drawing.
trans-unit.target: Isto denomina-se de desenho de proprietário.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The property value is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade não é um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode"> </xref> valor.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> is drawn and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode*> property is set to a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode"></xref> value other than <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> é desenhado e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode*>propriedade está definida como um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode"> </xref> valor diferente de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode*>

trans-unit.source: Use this event to customize the appearance of nodes in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control using owner drawing.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este evento para personalizar o aspeto de nós num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controlo utilizando o desenho de proprietário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode> values of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>.
trans-unit.target: Este evento é desencadeado apenas quando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>valores de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table indicates how the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> can be customized when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A> property is set to these values.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte indica como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>pode ser personalizado quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A>propriedade está definida como estes valores.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: |DrawMode property value|TreeNode customization| |-----------------------------|----------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>|The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> label area can be customized.
trans-unit.target: | O valor da propriedade DrawMode | Personalização de TreeNode | |-----------------------------|----------------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>| O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>área etiqueta pode ser personalizada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>

trans-unit.source: All other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> elements are drawn automatically.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>|The appearance of the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> can be customized.
trans-unit.target: Todos os outros elementos de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>são desenhados automaticamente. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>| O aspeto de todo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>podem ser personalizadas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: Icons, check boxes, plus and minus signs, and lines connecting the nodes must be drawn manually if they are desired.| The region that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value would occupy if it were drawn using the font specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> property is the region in which a node can be clicked to select it.
trans-unit.target: Ícones, verifique caixas, mais e menos inicia, e as linhas que ligam os nós tem de ser desenhadas manualmente se estes forem pretendidas. | A região que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valor seria ocupam se foram desenhada a utilizar o tipo de letra especificado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>propriedade é a região em que um nó pode ser clicado para o selecionar. do controlo</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This is called the hit test region.
trans-unit.target: Isto denomina-se a região de acessos de teste.

trans-unit.source: If you draw outside this region, you should provide your own code that selects a node when its visible area is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Se desenhar fora esta região, deve fornecer o seu próprio código que seleciona um nó quando for clicada respectiva área visível.

trans-unit.source: The hit test region corresponds to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property when using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>.
trans-unit.target: A região de teste acessos corresponde à <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade quando utilizar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>, however, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property encompasses the entire width of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.
trans-unit.target: Quando utilizar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>, no entanto, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade abrange a largura total do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can access the hit test region by getting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Node%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value and accessing its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, pode aceder a região de acessos de teste ao obter o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Node%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valor e aceder ao respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Node%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can then draw the hit test region of the node within these bounds, or you can provide your own hit test code.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, pode desenhar a região de acessos de teste do nó dentro estes limites ou, pode fornecer o seu próprio código de acessos de teste.

trans-unit.source: Note that setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.NodeFont%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property does not change the size of the hit test region, which is calculated using the font specified for the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que definir a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.NodeFont%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade não altera o tamanho da região de acessos de teste, que é calculado com o tipo de letra especificado para todo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.NodeFont%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Enables the redrawing of the tree view.
trans-unit.target: Permite um novo desenho a vista de árvore.

trans-unit.source: To maintain performance while items are added one at a time to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para manter o desempenho enquanto estão a ser adicionados um de cada vez para itens de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A> method prevents the control from painting until the EndUpdate method is called.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A>método impede que o controlo desenhar até que o método EndUpdate é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The preferred way to add items to a tree view control is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection.AddRange%2A> method to add an array of tree node items to a tree view.
trans-unit.target: A forma preferencial para adicionar itens a um controlo de vista de árvore consiste em utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection.AddRange%2A>método para adicionar uma matriz de itens de nó de árvore a uma vista de árvore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to add items one at a time, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A> method to prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control from painting during the add operations.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se pretender adicionar os itens um cada vez, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A>método para impedir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controlo de desenho durante as operações de adicionar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: To allow control the control to resume painting, call the EndUpdate method when all the tree nodes have been added to the tree view.
trans-unit.target: Para permitir controlo sobre o controlo para retomar o desenho, chame o método de EndUpdate quando todos os nós da árvore foram adicionados para a vista de árvore.

trans-unit.source: Expands all the tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: Expande todos os nós de árvore.

trans-unit.source: The ExpandAll method expands all the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects, which includes all the child tree nodes, that are in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: O método ExpandAll expande todos os <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>objetos, que inclui todos os subordinados nós de árvores, que se encontrem no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The state of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> persists.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O estado de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>persistir.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose that you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A> method, and then the individual root tree nodes are collapsed.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, suponha que tem de chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A>método e, em seguida, os nós da árvore de raiz individuais são fechado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: The child tree nodes have not been collapsed, and will appear in their previously-expanded state when the root tree nodes are expanded again.
trans-unit.target: Os nós da árvore de subordinados não tem sido fechados e serão apresentado no respetivo estado expandido anteriormente, quando os nós da árvore de raiz são expandidos novamente.

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CollapseAll%2A> method ensures that all the tree nodes appear in the collapsed state.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CollapseAll%2A>método garante que todos os nós da árvore aparecem no estado fechado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CollapseAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor de primeiro plano do controlo.

trans-unit.source: The foreground <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the control.
trans-unit.target: Primeiro plano <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> do controlo.

trans-unit.target: A predefinição é o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultForeColor*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultForeColor*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the selection highlight spans the width of the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o realce de seleção aumenta a largura do controlo de vista de árvore.

trans-unit.source: When FullRowSelect is `true`, a selection highlight spans the entire width of the tree view, display instead of the width of just the tree node label.
trans-unit.target: Quando é FullRowSelect `true`, realce um seleção aumenta a largura toda de vista de árvore, apresentado em vez da largura do apenas a etiqueta de nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: The FullRowSelect property is ignored if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowLines%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade FullRowSelect é ignorada se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowLines%2A>está definido como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowLines%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can pass the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.X%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Y%2A?displayProperty=fullName> coordinates of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event as the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> values of a new <xref:System.Drawing.Point>.
trans-unit.target: Pode passar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.X%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Y%2A?displayProperty=fullName>as coordenadas do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>evento como os <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A>valores de uma nova <xref:System.Drawing.Point>.</xref:System.Drawing.Point> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> e</xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Y%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.X%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> para avaliar e obter o nó do.

trans-unit.target: Obtém o nó da árvore momento com as coordenadas especificadas.

trans-unit.source: You can pass the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.X%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Y%2A?displayProperty=fullName> coordinates of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event as the `x` and `y` parameters.
trans-unit.target: Pode passar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.X%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Y%2A?displayProperty=fullName>coordena do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>evento como a `x` e `y` parâmetros.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Y%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.X%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> na localização especificada, em coordenadas de (cliente) de vista de árvore, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se não existir nenhum nó nessa localização.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the number of tree nodes, optionally including those in all subtrees, assigned to the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de nós de árvore, opcionalmente, incluindo as existentes na todas as subárvores, atribuídos ao controlo de vista de árvore.

trans-unit.source: If `includeSubTrees` is `true`, the result is the number of all the tree nodes in the entire tree structure.
trans-unit.target: Se `includeSubTrees` é `true`, o resultado é o número de todos os nós da árvore na estrutura de árvore completa.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to count the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> items that the subtrees contain; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>a contagem de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> itens que contêm as subárvores; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The number of tree nodes, optionally including those in all subtrees, assigned to the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: O número de nós de árvore, opcionalmente, incluindo as existentes na todas as subárvores, atribuídos ao controlo de vista de árvore.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the selected tree node remains highlighted even when the tree view has lost the focus.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o nó da árvore selecionado permanece realçado, mesmo quando a vista de árvore perdeu o foco.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `false`, selected nodes in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control remain highlighted in a different color than the current selection color when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control loses focus.
trans-unit.target: Quando esta propriedade está definida como `false`, selecionado nós a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controlo permanecem realçados numa cor diferentes que a seleção atual cor quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controlo perde o foco.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to keep items that are selected by the user visible when the user clicks a different control on the form or moves to a different window.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar esta propriedade para manter os itens seleccionados pelo utilizador visível quando o utilizador clica um controlo diferente no formulário ou movido para outro período.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you are concerned with the accessibility of your applications, it is recommended that you set the HideSelection property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se estiver preocupado com a acessibilidade das suas aplicações, é recomendável que defina a propriedade HideSelection é para `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the selected tree node is not highlighted when the tree view has lost the focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o nó da árvore selecionado não é realçado quando a vista de árvore perdeu o foco; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Provides node information, given a point.
trans-unit.target: Fornece informações de nó, atribuído um ponto.

trans-unit.target: Utilize este método para determinar se um ponto está localizado num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>e onde no nó de ponto de encontra-se, tal como na área de etiqueta ou image.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> at which to retrieve node information.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> no qual pretende obter informações do nó.

trans-unit.source: The node information.
trans-unit.target: As informações de nó.

trans-unit.target: Fornece informações de nó, dada coordenadas x e y.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine whether a set of x- and y-coordinates is located in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> and where within the node the point is located, such as on the label or image area.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método para determinar se um conjunto de coordenadas x e y está localizado num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>e onde no nó de ponto de encontra-se, tal como na área de etiqueta ou image.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.target: A coordenada x, no qual pretende obter informações do nó

trans-unit.target: A coordenada y no qual pretende obter informações do nó.

trans-unit.source: The node information.
trans-unit.target: As informações de nó.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a tree node label takes on the appearance of a hyperlink as the mouse pointer passes over it.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica que se uma etiqueta de nó de árvore demora no aspeto de um hyperlink como o ponteiro do rato passa por cima-lo.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A> property is set to `true`, the HotTracking property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>propriedade está definida como `true`, a propriedade HotTracking não tem qualquer efeito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the HotTracking property is set to `true`, each tree node label takes on the appearance of a hyperlink as the mouse pointer passes over it.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando HotTracking a propriedade está definida como `true`, cada árvore nó etiqueta demora no aspeto de um hyperlink como transmite de ponteiro do rato sobre ele.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.FontStyle> font style is applied to the <xref:System.Drawing.Font> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> is set to blue to make the label appear as a link.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.FontStyle>estilo de tipo de letra é aplicado para a <xref:System.Drawing.Font>e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>está definido como azul para tornar a etiqueta apresentada como uma ligação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Font> </xref:System.Drawing.FontStyle>

trans-unit.source: The appearance is not controlled by the Internet settings of the user's operating system.
trans-unit.target: O aspeto não é controlado pelas definições de Internet do sistema de operativo do utilizador.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a tree node label takes on the appearance of a hyperlink as the mouse pointer passes over it; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se precisar de uma etiqueta de nó de árvore no aspeto de um hyperlink como o ponteiro do rato passa por cima-los; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image-list index value of the default image that is displayed by the tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de índice de lista de imagens da imagem predefinida que é apresentado pelos nós da árvore.

trans-unit.source: The ImageIndex value is the index of an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor de ImageIndex é o índice de um <xref:System.Drawing.Image>armazenados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>atribuído para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A> and ImageIndex properties are mutually exclusive; if one is set, the other is ignored.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>e ImageIndex propriedades são mutuamente exclusivas se for definido um, outros são ignoradas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>, ImageIndex is automatically set to -1.
trans-unit.target: Se definir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>, ImageIndex é automaticamente definido como -1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, if you set ImageIndex, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A> is automatically set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Em alternativa, se definir ImageIndex, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>é automaticamente definido como uma cadeia vazia ("").</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When setting the ImageIndex property at run time, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> handle is recreated (see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) to update the control's appearance.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ao definir a propriedade ImageIndex em tempo de execução, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>identificador é recriado (consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) para atualizar o aspecto do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This causes all tree nodes to be collapsed, with the exception of the selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: Isto faz com que todos os nós da árvore de ser fechado com a exceção <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> selecionado

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index that represents the position of an <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> in an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um índice baseado em zero que representa a posição de um <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> num <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is zero.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é zero.

trans-unit.source: The specified index is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: O índice especificado é inferior a 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key of the default image for each node in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> control when it is in an unselected state.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a chave da imagem predefinida para cada nó no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> controlar quando está num Estado não seleccionado.

trans-unit.source: The ImageKey property is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de ImageKey é sensível.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> does not have an image set, the image specified by the ImageKey property will be shown when the node is not selected.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>não tem uma imagem definido, a imagem especificada pelo ImageKey propriedade será apresentada quando o nó não está selecionado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: When the node is selected, the first item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> will be shown.
trans-unit.target: Quando o nó é selecionado, o primeiro item de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>serão apresentados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: The ImageKey and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> properties are mutually exclusive, meaning if one is set, the other is ignored.
trans-unit.target: O ImageKey e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>propriedades são mutuamente exclusivas, que significa que o se um estiver definido, o outro é ignorado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the ImageKey property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> property is automatically set to -1.
trans-unit.target: Se definir a propriedade ImageKey, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>propriedade é automaticamente definida como -1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, if you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> property, the ImageKey is automatically set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Em alternativa, se definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>propriedade, o ImageKey é automaticamente definido como uma cadeia vazia ("").</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The key of the default image shown for each node <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> control when the node is in an unselected state.
trans-unit.target: A chave da imagem predefinida do mostrado para cada nó <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> controlar quando o nó está num Estado não seleccionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> objects that are used by the tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref> que contém o <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> objetos que são utilizados por nós da árvore.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> property value is anything other than `null`, all the tree nodes display the first <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>valor da propriedade é algo diferente de `null`, todos os nós da árvore apresentam o primeiro <xref:System.Drawing.Image>armazenados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Drawing.Image> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: You can specify which images from the list are displayed for selected and unselected nodes by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Pode especificar que as imagens na lista são apresentadas para nós selecionados e não seleccionados definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Individual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects can specify which image is displayed by setting their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.SelectedImageIndex%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Individuais <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>objetos podem especificar a imagem é apresentada ao definir as respetivas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.SelectedImageIndex%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.SelectedImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: These individual settings will override the settings in the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> properties.
trans-unit.target: Estas definições individuais substituirão as definições no correspondente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In the .NET Framework version 1.1, there is an issue that prevents images from appearing on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> nodes when your application calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > No .NET Framework versão 1.1, há um problema que impede a apresentação em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>nós quando a aplicação chama <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> imagens

trans-unit.source: To work around this issue, call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.DoEvents%2A?displayProperty=fullName> in your `Main` method immediately after you call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para contornar este problema, chame <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.DoEvents%2A?displayProperty=fullName>no seu `Main` método imediatamente após chamar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.DoEvents%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This issue is fixed in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Este problema ser corrigido no [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> objects that are used by the tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref> que contém o <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> objetos que são utilizados por nós da árvore.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance to indent each child tree node level.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a distância para avançar cada subordinado ao nível do nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to a value of -1 does not throw an exception if the value has not yet been changed from its default.
trans-unit.target: Definir esta propriedade para um valor de -1 não acionar uma excepção se o valor ainda não foi alterado de predefinido.

trans-unit.source: This is because the control uses a value of -1 as an internal default before the control handle has been created.
trans-unit.target: Isto acontece porque o controlo utiliza um valor de -1 como uma predefinição interna antes da criação do identificador de controlo.

trans-unit.source: This internal default value causes the wrapped control to return its own default value of 19.
trans-unit.target: Este valor de predefinição interna faz com que o controlo encapsulado devolver o seu próprio valor predefinido de 19 anos.

trans-unit.source: The distance, in pixels, to indent each child tree node level.
trans-unit.target: A distância, em pixels, para avançar cada nível de nó de árvore subordinada.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 19.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é 19.

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is less than 0 (see Remarks).
trans-unit.target: O valor atribuído é inferior a 0 (consulte observações).

trans-unit.source: -or- The assigned value is greater than 32,000.
trans-unit.target: - ou - o valor atribuído é superior ao 32,000.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a chave especificada é uma chave de entrada regular ou uma chave especial que requer pré-processamentos.

trans-unit.source: If the user is editing a tree node, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control treats keys such as ENTER, ESC, HOME, and END as input keys.
trans-unit.target: Se o utilizador está a editar um nó de árvore, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controlo trata as chaves como ENTER, ESC home page e de fim como chaves de entrada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: One of the Keys values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de chaves.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified key is a regular input key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a chave especificada é uma chave de entrada regular; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o utilizador começa a arrastar um nó.
