trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of each tree node in the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a altura de cada nó de árvore no controlo de vista de árvore.

trans-unit.source: If the item height is set to a value larger than the height of the tree view control, calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.EnsureVisible%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method will have unexpected results.
trans-unit.target: Se a altura do item está definida para um valor maior do que a altura do controlo de vista de árvore, ao chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.EnsureVisible%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método irá ter resultados inesperados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.EnsureVisible%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of each tree node in the tree view.
trans-unit.target: A altura, em pixels, de cada nó de árvore na vista de árvore.

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is less than one.
trans-unit.target: O valor atribuído é menor que um.

trans-unit.source: -or- The assigned value is greater than the <xref:System.Int16.MaxValue> value.
trans-unit.target: - ou - o valor atribuído é maior do que o <xref:System.Int16.MaxValue>valor.</xref:System.Int16.MaxValue>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the label text of the tree nodes can be edited.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o texto da etiqueta de nós de árvores pode ser editado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.BeginEdit%2A> method works only if the LabelEdit property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.BeginEdit%2A>método só funciona se a propriedade LabelEdit é `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.BeginEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: If LabelEdit is `false` when you attempt to edit the label, an exception will be thrown and the tree node will not be put in to an editable state.
trans-unit.target: Se for LabelEdit `false` quando tenta editar a etiqueta, será emitida uma exceção e o nó da árvore não irá ser colocado para um estado editável.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the label text of the tree nodes can be edited; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o texto da etiqueta de nós de árvores pode ser editado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the lines connecting the nodes of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor das linhas de ligar os nós do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> das linhas de ligar os nós da árvore.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o utilizador clica um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> com o rato.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the user clicks any part of a tree node with the mouse, including the plus sign (**+**) or minus sign (**-**) that indicates whether the node is collapsed or expanded.
trans-unit.target: Este evento ocorre quando o utilizador clica em qualquer parte de um nó de árvore com o rato, incluindo o sinal de adição (**+**) ou o sinal de subtração (**-**) que indica se o nó é fechado ou expandido.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If the mouse is located over a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>, the NodeMouseHover event will occur before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover> event.
trans-unit.target: Se encontra o rato sobre um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>, o evento NodeMouseHover irá ocorrer antes do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of tree nodes that are assigned to the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de nós da árvore que estão atribuídos ao controlo de vista de árvore.

trans-unit.source: The Nodes property holds a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects, each of which has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> property that can contain its own <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de nós contém uma coleção de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>objetos, cada um deles tem uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A>propriedade que pode conter os seus próprios <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: This nesting of tree nodes can make it difficult to navigate a tree structure, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A> property makes it easier to determine your location within the tree structure.
trans-unit.target: Este aninhamento de nós da árvore pode dificultar navegar uma estrutura de árvore, mas o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A>propriedade torna mais fácil determinar a localização dentro da estrutura de árvore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> that represents the tree nodes assigned to the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> que representa os nós da árvore atribuídos ao controlo de vista de árvore.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A> property is set to `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Handled%2A> property is set to `false`, the OnKeyDown method switches between selecting and clearing the check box when the user presses the SPACEBAR.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>propriedade está definida como `true` e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Handled%2A>propriedade está definida como `false`, o método OnKeyDown muda entre selecionar e ao desmarcar a caixa de verificação quando o utilizador prime a barra de espaço.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A> property is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control will select the first item that begins with the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A> property of `e`.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the delimiter string that the tree node path uses.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cadeia de delimitador que utiliza o caminho de nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: The tree node path consists of a set of tree node labels separated by the PathSeparator delimiter strings.
trans-unit.target: O caminho de nó de árvore é composta por um conjunto de etiquetas de nó de árvore separados pelas cadeias de delimitador PathSeparator.

trans-unit.source: The labels range from the root tree node to the tree node that you want.
trans-unit.target: O intervalo de etiquetas do nó da árvore de raiz para o nó de árvore que quiser.

trans-unit.source: The delimiter string that the tree node <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property uses.
trans-unit.target: O delimitador de cadeia que o nó da árvore <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName> utiliza de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The default is the backslash character (\\).
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é o caráter de barra invertida (\\).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> should be laid out from right-to-left.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> devem ser apresentados da direita para a esquerda.

trans-unit.source: The RightToLeftLayout property is for use with international applications where the language is read from right-to-left.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade RightToLeftLayout é é para utilização com aplicações internacionais onde o idioma é ler a partir da direita para a esquerda.

trans-unit.source: If you set RightToLeftLayout and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> to `true` the control's contents and text will be laid out from right-to-left.
trans-unit.target: Se definir RightToLeftLayout é e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>para `true` conteúdo e o texto do controlo serão dispostos da direita para a esquerda.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control should be laid out from right-to-left; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the tree view control displays scroll bars when they are needed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o controlo de vista de árvore apresenta barras de deslocamento se forem necessárias.

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `true`, scroll bars are displayed on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> when any <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> is located outside the control's client region.
trans-unit.target: Se esta propriedade estiver definida como `true`, são apresentadas barras de deslocamento no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>quando qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>está localizado fora da região de cliente do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When setting the Scrollable property at run time, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> handle is recreated (see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) to update the control's appearance.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ao definir a propriedade deslocável em tempo de execução, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>identificador é recriado (consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) para atualizar o aspecto do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This causes all tree nodes to be collapsed, with the exception of the selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: Isto faz com que todos os nós da árvore de ser fechado com a exceção <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> selecionado

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the tree view control displays scroll bars when they are needed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controlo de vista de árvore apresentar barras de deslocamento se forem necessárias; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image list index value of the image that is displayed when a tree node is selected.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de índice de lista de imagem da imagem que é apresentado quando um nó de árvore estiver selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The SelectedImageIndex value is the index of an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor de SelectedImageIndex é o índice de um <xref:System.Drawing.Image>armazenados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>atribuído para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When setting the SelectedImageIndex property at run time, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> handle is recreated (see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) to update the control's appearance.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ao definir a propriedade SelectedImageIndex em tempo de execução, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>identificador é recriado (consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) para atualizar o aspecto do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This causes all tree nodes to be collapsed, except for the selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: Isto faz com que todos os nós da árvore de ser fechado, exceto o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> selecionado

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index value that represents the position of an <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> in an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de índice baseado em zero que representa a posição de um <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> num <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The index assigned value is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: O valor de índice atribuído é menor do que zero.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key of the default image shown when a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> is in a selected state.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a chave da imagem predefinida do apresentado quando um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> está num Estado selecionado.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> does not have a selected image set, the image specified by the SelectedImageKey property will be shown when the node is not selected.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>não tem uma imagem selecionada definido, a imagem especificada pelo SelectedImageKey propriedade será apresentada quando o nó não está selecionado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The SelectedImageKey and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> properties are mutually exclusive; if one is set, the other is ignored.
trans-unit.target: O SelectedImageKey e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>propriedades são mutuamente exclusivas se for definido um, outros são ignoradas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the SelectedImageKey property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> property is automatically set to -1.
trans-unit.target: Se definir a propriedade SelectedImageKey, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>propriedade é automaticamente definida como -1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, if you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> property, the SelectedImageKey is automatically set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Em alternativa, se definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>propriedade, o SelectedImageKey é automaticamente definido como uma cadeia vazia ("").</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The key of the default image shown when a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> is in a selected state.
trans-unit.target: A chave da imagem predefinida do apresentado quando um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> está num Estado selecionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the tree node that is currently selected in the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nó da árvore que está atualmente selecionado no controlo de vista de árvore.

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> is currently selected, the SelectedNode property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se não <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>está atualmente selecionado, a propriedade de SelectedNode é `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: When you set this property, the specified node is scrolled into view and any parent nodes are expanded so that the specified node is visible.
trans-unit.target: Quando definir esta propriedade, o nó especificado é deslocar para ver e qualquer principal nós são expandidos para que o nó especificado está visível.

trans-unit.source: When the parent node or any ancestor node of the selected node is collapsed either programmatically or through user action, the collapsed node becomes the selected node.
trans-unit.target: Quando o nó principal ou de qualquer nó predecessor do nó selecionado está fechado o programaticamente ou através da ação do utilizador, o nó fechado torna-se o nó selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> that is currently selected in the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> que está atualmente selecionada no controlo de vista de árvore.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether lines are drawn between tree nodes in the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se linhas são desenhadas entre nós da árvore de controlo de vista de árvore.

trans-unit.source: If ShowLines is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.FullRowSelect%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se ShowLines estiver definido como `true`, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.FullRowSelect%2A>propriedade é ignorada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.FullRowSelect%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if lines are drawn between tree nodes in the tree view control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as linhas forem desenhadas entre nós da árvore de controlo de vista de árvore; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating ToolTips are shown when the mouse pointer hovers over a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica as descrições são mostradas quando o ponteiro do rato passa sobre um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: In order for ToolTips to be visible, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ToolTipText%2A> for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: Por ordem para descrições seja visível, tem de definir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ToolTipText%2A>para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ToolTipText%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if ToolTips are shown when the mouse pointer hovers over a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as descrições são mostradas quando o ponteiro do rato passa sobre um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether plus-sign (+) and minus-sign (-) buttons are displayed next to tree nodes that contain child tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os botões de sinal de subtração (-) e sinal de adição (+) são apresentados junto de nós da árvore que contém nós da árvore de subordinados.

trans-unit.source: The plus sign and minus sign buttons appear next to the root tree nodes only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowRootLines%2A> property value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Os botões de sinal de adição e sinal de subtração aparecem junto o raiz da árvore nós apenas se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowRootLines%2A>valor da propriedade é `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowRootLines%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the plus sign and minus sign buttons are not displayed, no visual cue exists to indicate that the tree node contains child tree nodes and is expandable.
trans-unit.target: Se os botões de sinal de adição e sinal de subtração não forem apresentados, não rectângulos visual existe para indicar que o nó da árvore contém nós da árvore de subordinados e for possível expandir.

trans-unit.source: The user then must double-click a tree node to determine whether it contains child tree nodes, to expand it, or to collapse it.
trans-unit.target: O utilizador tem faça duplo clique para determinar se contém nós de árvore subordinada, para expandir ou fechar-nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if plus sign and minus sign buttons are displayed next to tree nodes that contain child tree nodes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o sinal de adição e sinal de subtração botões são apresentados junto de nós da árvore que contém nós da árvore de subordinados; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether lines are drawn between the tree nodes that are at the root of the tree view.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se linhas são desenhadas entre os nós da árvore que estão na raiz da vista de árvore.

trans-unit.source: If the ShowRootLines property is `false`, the plus-sign and minus-sign buttons will not appear next to the root tree nodes, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowPlusMinus%2A> property will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade ShowRootLines for `false`, os botões de início de sessão plus e sinal de subtração não serão apresentados junto a nós de árvore raiz e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowPlusMinus%2A>propriedade não tem qualquer efeito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowPlusMinus%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if lines are drawn between the tree nodes that are at the root of the tree view; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as linhas forem desenhadas entre os nós da árvore que estão na raiz da vista de árvore; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sorts the items in <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ordena os itens no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: This method reapplies the default sort, which is alphabetical by node text, or a custom sort specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.TreeViewNodeSorter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Este método volta a ordenação predefinido, que é alfabética por texto do nó, ou uma ordenação personalizada especificado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.TreeViewNodeSorter%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.TreeViewNodeSorter%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this method if the text of existing nodes is changed or nodes are moved by the user, and you want to sort the items again.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar este método se o texto de nós existentes foi alterado ou nós são movidos pelo utilizador e que pretende ordenar os itens novamente.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The default sorter uses the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A> method based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A> specified by the application.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O sorter predefinido utiliza a <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A>método baseado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A>especificado pela aplicação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A>

trans-unit.source: This means that <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects with equal value are kept in the order in which they were added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: Isto significa que <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>objetos com um valor igual são mantidos na ordem em que foram adicionados para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: This behavior may be different if a custom sort is applied.
trans-unit.target: Este comportamento pode ser diferente se for aplicada uma ordenação personalizada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the tree nodes in the tree view are sorted.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os nós da árvore na vista de árvore são ordenados.

trans-unit.source: When Sorted is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects are sorted in alphabetical order by their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: Quando Sorted está definida como `true`, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>objetos são ordenados por ordem alfabética pelo respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A>valores de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: You should always use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A> to maintain performance when you add a large quantity of items to a sorted <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.
trans-unit.target: Deve sempre utilizar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A>para manter o desempenho quando adiciona uma grande quantidade de itens para uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> ordenada</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the text of an existing node is changed, you must call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Sort%2A> to resort the items.
trans-unit.target: Quando o texto de um nó existente é alterado, tem de chamar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Sort%2A>para recorrer os itens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Sort%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The default sorter uses the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A> method based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A> specified by the application.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O sorter predefinido utiliza a <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A>método baseado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A>especificado pela aplicação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A>

trans-unit.source: This means that <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects with equal value are kept in the order in which they were added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: Isto significa que <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>objetos com um valor igual são mantidos na ordem em que foram adicionados para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the tree nodes in the tree view are sorted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os nós da árvore na vista de árvore são ordenados; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image list that is used to indicate the state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> and its nodes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a lista de imagens que é utilizada para indicar o estado do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> e respetivos nós.

trans-unit.source: To indicate the state of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>, set the StateImageList property and also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageKey%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageIndex%2A> property for each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: Para indicar o estado de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>, defina a propriedade StateImageList e também definir a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageKey%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageIndex%2A>propriedade para cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageIndex%2A> ou</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageKey%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The state images displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> are 16 x 16 pixels by default.
trans-unit.target: As imagens de estado apresentadas no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>são 16x16 pixels por predefinição.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A> property of the StateImageList will have no effect on how the images are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>propriedade StateImageList não tem qualquer efeito na forma como são apresentadas as imagens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, the state images are resized according to the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ``` When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> is set to `true` and the StateImageList property is set, each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> that is contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> displays the first and second images from the StateImageList to indicate an unchecked or checked state, respectively.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, as imagens de estado são redimensionadas, de acordo com a definição do sistema DPI quando o ficheiro App. config contém a seguinte entrada: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ``` quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>está definido como `true` e StateImageList for definida, cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>que faz a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>apresenta as imagens primeira e segunda na StateImageList para indicar um Estado marcado ou desmarcado, respetivamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>

trans-unit.source: You should set the StateImageList property before you add nodes to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> to prevent state images being shown at design time for nodes that do not have a state image set.
trans-unit.target: Deve definir a propriedade StateImageList antes de adicionar nós para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>impedir que as imagens de estado a ser mostradas no momento da conceção para nós que não dispõe de uma imagem de estado definido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> used for indicating the state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> and its nodes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref> utilizado para indicar o estado do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> e respetivos nós.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não é relevante para esta classe.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Null" name="Null" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Null" name="Null" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Text*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Text*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Text*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the first fully-visible tree node in the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o primeiro nó de árvore totalmente visível no controlo de vista de árvore.

trans-unit.source: Initially, the TopNode returns the first root tree node, which is located at the top of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.
trans-unit.target: Inicialmente, o TopNode devolve o primeiro nó de árvore de raiz, o que está localizado na parte superior do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: However, if the user has scrolled the contents, another tree node might be at the top.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se o utilizador tem deslocar o conteúdo, poderá ser outro nó de árvore na parte superior.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting this property has no effect when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Scrollable%2A> property value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Definição desta propriedade não tem que tenha efeito quando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Scrollable%2A>valor da propriedade é `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Scrollable%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> that represents the first fully-visible tree node in the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> que representa o primeiro nó de árvore totalmente visível do controlo de vista de árvore.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> containing the name of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>, if any.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref:System.String>contendo o nome do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>, se aplicável.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This method should not be overridden.
trans-unit.target: Este método não deve ser substituído.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the name of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>, if any, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> is unnamed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>contendo o nome do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>, se aplicável, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> é sem nome.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the implementation of <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> to perform a custom sort of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> nodes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a implementação de <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>para efetuar um personalizado ordenação do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> nós.</xref:System.Collections.IComparer>

trans-unit.source: The custom sort is applied when the TreeViewNodeSorter is set.
trans-unit.target: A ordenação personalizada é aplicada quando o TreeViewNodeSorter está definido.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> label is changed, you can call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Sort%2A> method to sort the items again with the custom sorter specified by the TreeViewNodeSorter property.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>etiqueta é alterada, pode chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Sort%2A>método para ordenar os itens novamente com o sorter personalizado especificado pela propriedade TreeViewNodeSorter.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Sort%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The default sorter uses the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A> method based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A> specified by the application.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O sorter predefinido utiliza a <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A>método baseado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A>especificado pela aplicação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A>

trans-unit.source: This means that <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects with equal value are kept in the order in which they were added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: Isto significa que <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>objetos com um valor igual são mantidos na ordem em que foram adicionados para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: This behavior may be different if a custom sort is applied.
trans-unit.target: Este comportamento pode ser diferente se for aplicada uma ordenação personalizada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> to perform the custom sort.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>para efetuar a ordenação personalizada.</xref:System.Collections.IComparer>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of tree nodes that can be fully visible in the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de nós da árvore que podem ser totalmente visível no controlo de vista de árvore.

trans-unit.source: The VisibleCount value can be greater than the number of tree nodes in the tree view.
trans-unit.target: O valor de VisibleCount pode ser maior que o número de nós da árvore na vista de árvore.

trans-unit.source: The value is calculated by dividing the height of the client window by the height of a tree node item.
trans-unit.target: O valor é calculado dividindo a altura da janela do cliente pela altura de um item de nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: The result is the total number of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> can display within its current dimensions.
trans-unit.target: O resultado é o número total de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>objetos de que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>pode apresentar dentro do respetivas dimensões atuais.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> items that can be fully visible in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: O número de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> itens que podem ser totalmente visíveis no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Overrides <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc*>.
trans-unit.target: Substituições <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc*>

trans-unit.source: The Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> to process.
trans-unit.target: O Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref> ao processo.
